Hola!

I am Sergio de las Heras, doctoral researcher in the [Aalto Acoustics Lab](https://www.aalto.fi/en/aalto-acoustics-lab) in Helsinki, investigating room acoustic perception.

Currently based in Santa Clara Valley, working as an Audio Technology intern for [Apple](https://www.apple.com).
